title: Walk-in appointments available at Baptist Health COVID-19 vaccine clinics
body: LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) - Walk-in appointments for the COVID-19 vaccine are available at Baptist Health locations in Lexington, Richmond, and Corbin during the following times.Appointments are for the first dose of the Pfizer vaccine. Anyone 16 and older is eligible, but a parent or guardian must accompany those under 18. A valid photo ID and insurance card are required for any minor.Appointments are available as long as vaccine supplies last.
